title: Lesson 11 - Integrate details page into application
contents:
mode_edit

第 11 課 - 將詳情頁面整合到應用程式中link

Lesson 11 - Integrate details page into applicationlink

本課程示範瞭如何將詳情頁面連線到應用程式中。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to connect the details page to your app.

所需時間： 完成這節課預計需要 20 分鐘左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 20 minutes to complete this lesson.

開始之前link

Before you startlink

這節課以上一課的程式碼為起點，你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在整合開發環境（IDE）中使用你在第 10 課中建立的程式碼。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 10 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 從上一課的程式碼範例開始。選擇，以便

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 10 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的線上例子，其中 StackBlitz 的介面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下載範例並在你的 IDE 中開啟它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你還沒看過簡介，請存取 Angular 課程簡介以確保你已具備完成這節課所需的一切知識。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在這節課中遇到任何問題，可以檢視這節課的完整程式碼，參見。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之後link

After you finishlink

當這節課結束時，應用程式將支援路由到詳情頁面。

At the end of this lesson your application will have support for routing to the details page.

帶引數路由的概念性預覽link

Conceptual preview of routing with route parameterslink

在上一課中，你嚮應用添加了路由，在這節課中，你將擴充應用支援的路由型別。每個房屋位置都有自己的詳情，當用戶導航到該條目的詳情頁面時應顯示這些詳情。要實現此目標，就要使用路由引數。

In the previous lesson, you added routing to your app and in this lesson you will expand the types of routing your app supports. Each housing location has specific details that should be displayed when a user navigates to the details page for that item. To accomplish this goal, you will need to use route parameters.

路由引數使你能夠將動態資訊作為路由 URL 的一部分。要確定使用者點選了哪個房屋位置，你要使用 HousingLocation 型別的 id 屬性。

Route parameters enable you to include dynamic information as a part of your route URL. To identify which housing location a user has clicked on you will use the id property of the HousingLocation type.

課程步驟link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中對應用程式程式碼執行下列步驟。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 為你的應用建立新服務link

Step 1 - Create a new service for your applink

在第 10 課中，你向 src/app/routes.ts 添加了第二條路由，該路由包含一個特殊區段，用於標識路由引數 id：

In lesson 10, you added a second route to src/app/routes.ts, this route includes a special segment that identifies the route parameter, id:

'details/:id'

在這種情況下，:id 是動態的，並且會根據程式碼請求路由的方式而變化。

In this case, :id is dynamic and will change based on how the route is requested by the code.

  1. 在 src/app/housing-location/housing-location.component.ts 中，將錨點標記（<a>）新增到 section 元素幷包含 routerLink 指令：

    In src/app/housing-location/housing-location.component.ts, add an anchor tag to the section element and include the routerLink directive:

    template: ` <section class="listing"> <img class="listing-photo" [src]="housingLocation.photo" alt="Exterior photo of {{housingLocation.name}}"> <h2 class="listing-heading">{{ housingLocation.name }}</h2> <p class="listing-location">{{ housingLocation.city}}, {{housingLocation.state }}</p> <a [routerLink]="['/details', housingLocation.id]">Learn More</a> </section> `,

    routerLink 指令使 Angular 的路由器能夠在應用程式中建立動態連結。賦值給 routerLink 的值是一個包含兩個條目的陣列：路徑的靜態部分和動態資料。

    The routerLink directive enables Angular's router to create dynamic links in the application. The value assigned to the routerLink is an array with two entries: the static portion of the path and the dynamic data.

  2. 此時你可以確認路由在應用程式中能正常工作。在瀏覽器中，重新整理主頁並單擊房屋位置的“瞭解更多”按鈕。

    At this point you can confirm that the routing is working in your app. In the browser, refresh the home page and click the "learn more" button for a housing location.

第 2 步 - 獲取路由引數link

Step 2 - Get route parameterslink

在此步驟中，你將獲取 DetailsComponent 中的路由引數。目前，該應用程式顯示 details works!，接下來你將更新程式碼以顯示使用路由引數傳過來的 id 值。

In this step, you will get the route parameter in the DetailsComponent. Currently, the app displays details works!, next you'll update the code to display the id value passed using the route parameters.

  1. 在 src/app/details/details.component.ts 中更新範本以匯入你需要在 DetailsComponent 中使用的函式、類和服務：

    In src/app/details/details.component.ts update the template to import the functions, classes and services that you'll need to use in the DetailsComponent:

    import { Component, inject } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { HousingService } from '../housing.service'; import { HousingLocation } from '../housinglocation';

  2. 更新 @Component 裝飾器的 template 屬性以顯示值 housingLocationId：

    Update the template property of the @Component decorator to display the value housingLocationId:

    template: `<p>details works! {{ housingLocationId }}</p>`,

  3. 使用以下程式碼更新 DetailsComponent 的主體：

    Update the body of the DetailsComponent with the following code:

    export class DetailsComponent { route: ActivatedRoute = inject(ActivatedRoute); housingLocationId = -1; constructor() { this.housingLocationId = Number(this.route.snapshot.params['id']); } }

    此程式碼令 DetailsComponent 可以存取路由器特性 ActivatedRoute，使你能存取關於當前路由的資料。在建構函式中，程式碼將 id 引數從路由轉換為數字。

    This code give the DetailsComponent access to the ActivatedRoute router feature that enables you to have access to the data about the current route. In the constructor, the code converts the id parameter from the route to a number.

  4. 儲存所有更改。

    Save all changes.

  5. 在瀏覽器中，單擊其中一個房屋位置的“瞭解更多”連結，並確認頁面上顯示的數值與資料中該位置的 id 屬性匹配。

    In the browser, click on one of the housing location "learn more" links and confirm that the numeric value displayed on the page matches the id property for that location in the data.

第 3 步 - 自訂 DetailComponentlink

Step 3 - Customize the DetailComponentlink

路由已能在應用程式中正常工作，接下來要更新 DetailsComponent 的範本，以顯示由路由引數的房屋位置表示的特定資料。

Now that routing is working properly in the application this is a great time to update the template of the DetailsComponent to display the specific data represented by the housing location for the route parameter.

要存取資料，你需要新增對 HousingService 的呼叫。

To access the data you will add a call to the HousingService.

  1. 把範本程式碼更新成這樣：

    Update the template code to match the following code:

    template: ` <article> <img class="listing-photo" [src]="housingLocation?.photo" alt="Exterior photo of {{housingLocation?.name}}"/> <section class="listing-description"> <h2 class="listing-heading">{{housingLocation?.name}}</h2> <p class="listing-location">{{housingLocation?.city}}, {{housingLocation?.state}}</p> </section> <section class="listing-features"> <h2 class="section-heading">About this housing location</h2> <ul> <li>Units available: {{housingLocation?.availableUnits}}</li> <li>Does this location have wifi: {{housingLocation?.wifi}}</li> <li>Does this location have laundry: {{housingLocation?.laundry}}</li> </ul> </section> </article> `,

    請注意，正在使用可選的鏈式運算子（?）存取 housingLocation 屬性。這會確保如果 housingLocation 值為 null 或 undefined 時，應用程式不會崩潰。

    Notice that the housingLocation properties are being accessed with the optional chaining operator ?. This ensures that if the housingLocation value is null or undefined the application doesn't crash.

  2. 把 DetailsComponent 類別的主體更新成這樣：

    Update the body of the DetailsComponent class to match the following code:

    export class DetailsComponent { route: ActivatedRoute = inject(ActivatedRoute); housingService = inject(HousingService); housingLocation: HousingLocation | undefined; constructor() { const housingLocationId = Number(this.route.snapshot.params['id']); this.housingLocation = this.housingService.getHousingLocationById(housingLocationId); } }

    現在該元件有了根據所選房屋位置顯示正確資訊的程式碼。建構函式現在包括對 HousingService 的呼叫，以將路由引數作為實參傳給 getHousingLocationById 服務函式。

    Now the component has the code to display the correct information based on the selected housing location. The constructor now includes a call to the HousingService to pass the route parameter as an argument to the getHousingLocationById service function.

  3. 將以下樣式複製到 src/app/details/details.component.css 檔案中：

    Copy the following styles into the src/app/details/details.component.css file:

    .listing-photo { height: 600px; width: 50%; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 30px; float: right; } .listing-heading { font-size: 48pt; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px; } .listing-location::before { content: url('/assets/location-pin.svg') / ''; } .listing-location { font-size: 24pt; margin-bottom: 15px; } .listing-features > .section-heading { color: var(--secondary-color); font-size: 24pt; margin-bottom: 15px; } .listing-features { margin-bottom: 20px; } .listing-features li { font-size: 14pt; } li { list-style-type: none; } .listing-apply .section-heading { font-size: 18pt; margin-bottom: 15px; } label, input { display: block; } label { color: var(--secondary-color); font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 12pt; } input { font-size: 16pt; margin-bottom: 15px; padding: 10px; width: 400px; border-top: none; border-right: none; border-left: none; border-bottom: solid .3px; } @media (max-width: 1024px) { .listing-photo { width: 100%; height: 400px; } }

  4. 儲存你的更改。

    Save your changes.

  5. 在瀏覽器中重新整理頁面並確認當你單擊給定房屋位置的“瞭解更多”連結時，詳情頁面會根據所選條目的資料顯示正確的資訊。

    In the browser refresh the page and confirm that when you click on the "learn more" link for a given housing location the details page displays the correct information based on the data for that selected item.

第 4 步 - 將導航新增到 HomeComponent 中link

Step 4 - Add navigation to the HomeComponentlink

在上一課中，你更新了 AppComponent 範本以包含 routerLink。新增該程式碼會更新應用程式，以便在單擊徽標時能夠導航回 HomeComponent。

In a previous lesson you updated the AppComponent template to include a routerLink. Adding that code updated your app to enable navigation back to the HomeComponent whenever the logo is clicked.

  1. 確認你的程式碼與以下內容一致：

    Confirm that your code matches the following:

    template: ` <main> <a [routerLink]="['/']"> <header class="brand-name"> <img class="brand-logo" src="/assets/logo.svg" alt="logo" aria-hidden="true"> </header> </a> <section class="content"> <router-outlet></router-outlet> </section> </main> `,

    你的程式碼可能已經是最新的，但還是請再次確認。

    Your code may already be up-to-date but confirm to be sure.

課程複習link

Lesson Reviewlink

在這節課中，你將應用更新為：

In this lesson you updated your app to:

  • 使用路由引數將資料傳給路由

    use route parameters to pass data to a route

  • 使用 routerLink 指令使用動態資料建立路由

    use the routerLink directive to use dynamic data to create a route

  • 使用路由引數從 HousingService 檢索資料以顯示特定房屋位置的資訊。

    use route parameter to retrieve data from the HousingService to display housing location specific information.

到目前為止真的很棒。

Really great work so far.

如果你在學習這節課時遇到了任何問題，可以在檢視完整程式碼。

If you are having any trouble with this lesson, you can review the completed code for it in the .
